formdata.value:
Dear kind people,

This cause is being raised to pay the due fees of a very talented 3rd-year BCA student - Huzaifa who aspires to become a great techie & serve his family & society in the future.

Huzaifa, 21, hails from Pune & is a meritorious IT student who studies at Abeda Inamdar College, Kondhwa, Pune.

Huzaifa belongs to a low-income group. His father, who on his daily wages could hardly make ends meet, was diagnosed with Wallenberg Syndrome last year. Moreover, the ongoing pandemic destroyed all sources of his livelihood & the family exhausted all their savings in paying the hospital bill. Consequently, bearing the expenses of the education of the children & the medication of the father became a challenge.

Despite all the unfavourable circumstances, Huzaifa has maintained academic consistency & scored brilliantly.

What the student has to say:

"Assalamu alaikum, I have always dreamt of being an IT professional & I stand a great chance to build my career in the software industry.
By the grace of Allah & support from kind people, I have paid my full fees for 2nd year, Alhamdulillah.
I request you to help me in this tough situation. I shall never forget any donations that I receive & will help the needy by giving back to society when I become self-dependent, Insha Allah!"

create user,set password , change password and all these things.
